item.title: Construction workerâ€™s daughter from a govt. college secures fifth rank in Arts
item.description:
<![CDATA[Nagaveni Raichur, daughter of a construction worker and a housemaid from Hubballi, has secured the fifth rank in the Arts stream of II PU examination, the results of which were declared on Tuesday.
Pursuing her education amid odds, Nagaveni even worked part-time during vacation to support her parents. She is a student of the Government PU College at Gopanakoppa in Hubballi.
Nagaveni has scored 100 each in Geography and Political Science, 99 each in History, Education and Kannada and 96 in Hind...]]>
item.author: Authors
